example: She twisted her ankle when she fell. 她摔倒时扭伤了脚踝。 《21世纪大英汉词典》
The flesh around the ankle had swollen up. 脚踝四周的皮肉肿起来了。
Stay away from horizontal lines, such as horizontal stripes on garments, chokers, and ankle straps, unless you do something to diminish their effect. 不要那些水平线条，比如衣服、项链还有踝袜上的水平条纹，除非你做点别的来削弱它们的效果。
